metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11937 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In whoopsie, parse_report() from whoopsie.c allows a local attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted file. The DoS is caused by resource exhaustion due to a memory leak. Fixed in 0.2.52.5ubuntu0.5, 0.2.62ubuntu0.5 and 0.2.69ubuntu0.1.

criterions.comment: whoopsie: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
